name: DEAD ENGINE
description:
PLAY IN FULLSCREEN FOR BEST EXPERIENCE

The Creatures have destroyed your engine and have taken the pieces. Now you have to fight them in order to get the pieces to rebuild.

Fight through the hordes in this fast paced hardcore action top down shooter and hopefully defeat the monsters that trapped you in their world!

Playable on both PC and mobile

Some Software I used:

Scratch (vector art)

Gdevelop(Obviously)

Inshot , Canva(Cutscene)

Music used in the game by Tevvez.

Instructions are in game click controls.
